title:
Icons Creation. What for?
Most Important How?
short: It is next to impossible to overestimate a role of icons in really authentic design projects. The icons underline important pieces of information, help you to navigate quicker and make the information breathing. Thoroughly elaborated icons structurize your web-site in a better way, make the design more complete and attractive and bring new accents to an already finalized project
